The biggest problem in the crypto perps trading space is the likelihood of absolute loss over long periods of time

The solution is loss-mined tokens that reward users for their losses

By earning a piece of the house when losing, when you lose you win 🤯🐂 https://t.co/8l2pQfdh3a

Conventional cycle theory says btcd should go up a lot here but i think ethbtc has clearly bottomed and the bullish btc etf inflows will signal to mkt what to expect for eth etf, and also not much outperforms sol / new L1s

Its important to think in percentages rather than dollars as markets go higher

For instance a one thousand dollar move on #Bitcoin is now only 2%, while before it may have been closer to 10%
情人节💝

I dont think Eigenlayer poses substantial risk atm

Itd be different if ppl borrowed eth vs restaked eth and then continually restaked it on Eigenlayer, thereby subjecting themselves to the possibility that eth liquidity pulls, increasing rates, turning it into neg carry unwind
